name: Kon Tum
subtitle: Central Southern Coast
description: Kon Tum is the perfect place for nature lovers who want to roam among the dramatic scenic natural beauty surrounded by lakes, mountains, cafe plantations

name: Gia Lai
subtitle: Central Southern Coast
description: Located in the North of the Central Highlands is Gia Lai mountain town with majestic natural scenery and unique and attractive destinations.

name: Dak Lak
subtitle: Central Southern Coast
description: Dak Lak is a highland region surrounded by mountains, forests and valleys and filled with rivers, streams, lakes and waterfalls.

name: Dak Nong
subtitle: Central Southern Coast
description: Dak Nong is a province in the Central Highlands region of Vietnam, known for its rich biodiversity and geological heritage.

name: Lâm Đồng
subtitle: Central Southern Coast
description: Located in the Central Highlands region, Lam Dong is a mountainous province, and 70% of its area is covered in forest
